diff_act: 1.provide the ability to override its default schedule temporarily
4.Revert to default settings after the end of the current time period.

regen.absent_element: situation of reverting to default settings and providing override capability
regen.new_specification: The system shall revert the power switch to its default settings at the end of the current time period unless a new time-defined override is specified.

regen.absent_element: temporary override of default time periods
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow users to temporarily override the default time settings for appliance states during the current time period.

regen.absent_element: Reverting system to default settings after current period
regen.new_specification: After the current time period ends, the system shall revert the state of a power switch to its default settings.

label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: revert to the default setting after the manual set state ends
